name: Global Gateway
tagline: Your choice for contact center solutions.
description: Global Gateway Solutions, Inc.(GGS) is a leading provider of global contact center solutions servicing the financial, telecommunications, Business-to-Business, Insurance, Health Care, and Travel and Hospitality industries. Headquartered in Plantation, Florida with offices in Montego Bay, Jamaica, GGS operates a 24X7 fully equipped 150 seat center, enabling solution delivery world-wide.
